unittitle_ssm: Abbot Low Moffat collection of Brooklyn photography
abstract_ssm: Images in the collection primarily depict houses and street scenes in Brooklyn, N.Y. While many houses are unidentified, the collection also includes images of notable Brooklyn homes, such as the Cortelyou House, the Lefferts House, the Lott House, and the Duryea house.
